summary: A South Korean has a different person's body, changing every morning to a body "borrowed" for a day - man, woman, old, child and sometimes a foreigner. "He" works as furniture designer. He loves a girl. She loves him for the beauty inside.
cast: Han Hyo-joo|Park Seo-Joon|Juri Ueno|Jin-wook Lee|Ju-hyuk Kim|Yeon-Seok Yoo|Sung-Woo Bae|Woo-hee Chun|Ji-han Do|Karel Herm√°nek Jr.|Da-mi Hong|Eui-soo Jang|Dal-hwan Jo|Seo Kang-Joon|Dae-Myung Kim|Hee-won Kim|Min-Jae Kim|Sang-ho Kim|Asung Ko|Beom-su Lee|Dong-hwi Lee|Dong-Wook Lee|Hyun-Woo Lee|Jae-Joon Lee|Ji-Min Lee|Kyeong-yeong Lee|Mi-do Lee|Suk Mun|Park Shin-Hye|Kim Yi-Jeong|Yeo-jin Yoon
title: Byuti insaideu
